name: Fruit Punch (itch)
description:
The wet dream Mike Tyson needed, not the one he wanted.

WASD - To move.

SPACE - To jump.

SHIFT - To run.

LEFT CLICK - To jab, or hug.

RIGHT CLICK - To uppercut.
